trans-unit.source: Identifies the property to associate with the [xml:lang](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xml-lang-handling-in-xaml.md) attribute.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade a ser associada ao atributo [xml:lang](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xml-lang-handling-in-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: Nas versões anteriores do .NET Framework, essa classe existia no assembly específicos de WPF WindowsBase.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLangPropertyAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLangPropertyAttribute> está no assembly System. XAML.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tipos migrados do WPF para System. XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: The property name to associate with the <see langword="xml:lang" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a ser associada ao atributo <see langword="xml:lang" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLangPropertyAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLangPropertyAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the property that is specified in this attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da propriedade que está especificada nesse atributo.
